==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Tenebrous Mimiflora

|name_1      = Mimicry
|desc_1      = When entering battle, takes the form of an [[Anemo Hilichurl Rogue]]. While in this form, the Tenebrous Mimiflora possesses a Void Ward which grants it immunity to DMG until destroyed and has a durability of '''70'''. The durability will reduce by '''1''' when hit by an Elemental attack, or '''3''' when hit by a [[Nightsoul]]-aligned attack.<br><br>When durability is depleted, the Tenebrous Mimiflora will return to its true form and become briefly stunned, but will re-transform after some time. However, when generating the Void Ward for the second time, then from the third time onward, its durability will be reduced to '''35''' and '''14''' respectively.

|name_2      = Attrition
|desc_2      = Some of the Mimiflora's attacks inflict stacks of Attrition on hit. The amount of stacks inflicted depends on the attack. For each stack, the affected character will lose [[HP]] equal to '''1% Max HP + 50''' after a short delay.

|name_3      = Abyssal Impalement
|desc_3      = While in its true form, shoots forward a trail of spikes, dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_4      = Abyssal Spheres
|desc_4      = While in its true form, shoots 3 homing projectiles, each dealing '''20% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and inflicting '''1''' stack of '''Attrition''' on hit.

|name_5      = Teleport Slash
|desc_5      = Teleports to the player and performs a single slash, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Anemo DMG}} and inflicting '''12''' stacks of '''Attrition''' on hit.
}}
